com.irurueta.server.commons.email

Class TextEmailMessageWithAttachments<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.EmailMessage<E>
      • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.TextEmailMessage<E>
        • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.TextEmailMessageWithAttachments<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - internal representation of email using by internal client.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApacheMailTextEmailMessageWithAttachments, JavaMailTextEmailMessageWithAttachments

    public abstract class TextEmailMessageWithAttachments<E>
extends TextEmailMessage<E>
    Base class for text only email messages containing file attachments.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private List<EmailAttachment> mAttachments
      List of attachments to be included in email.
